bug.author: Jabkowsky
bug.summary: Semantic Tag for new props does not work Carla 0.9.9
bug.description: Window version build from source ( 0.9.9.3 ) I have add the new props to .json file : ( Default.Package.json ) Example: { "name": "PedCross", "path": "/Game/Carla/Static/Props/Street/SM_PedCross.SM_PedCross", "size": "Small", "tag": "TrafficSigns" }, After build I can spawn "PedCross" sign as i need, but this "actor" does not appear on camera semantic segmentation as "TrafficSigns". ( tag ). All new props added are visible on segmentation as Unlabeled = 0 even if i specified the tag in .json file. Can you help me to fix this issue ? Am I doing something wrong ?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marcgpuig>@marcgpuig</denchmark-link> since you are working on this, could you please provide a solution?

EDIT: i tried with properly tagged stop sign in town10hd and add the same stop sign in jason file with same tag. It look like this <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44050097/87913995-49b57c80-ca70-11ea-8f6b-455c250de89c.png></denchmark-link>
Originally added stop sign to town is segmented with TAG = 12 correctly but spawned same sign : { "name": "Stop", "path": "/Game/Carla/Static/TrafficSigns/Stop/SM_stopSign.SM_stopSign", "size": "Small", "tag": "TrafficSigns" } Is not. It appears only with TAG = 0 : <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44050097/87914193-9600bc80-ca70-11ea-9b59-02b07f7ec4d8.png></denchmark-link>
And now difference in carlalib ( c++ ) i found : Original stop sign is such actor -> <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44050097/87914318-c2b4d400-ca70-11ea-83ae-4c10201d9ca7.png></denchmark-link>
It has an correct tag "semantic_tags"[1] = 12 But props actor added to map while "playing" -> <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44050097/87914444-eb3cce00-ca70-11ea-9f25-ab9c038d76d1.png></denchmark-link>
has empty semantic_tags property.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
